column4: can anyone help me figure out what is wrong with my X server? it starts up, but I can't use my mouse or keyboard
upgrading to what? do you mean apt-get upgrade?
well, I just installed a new wireless card, so I don't have a connection
it says there is nothing upgradable when I run apt-get upgrade
the keyboard and the mouse don't work or is it just the mouse
both keyboard and mouse - but I can hit ctrl+alt+F1 and go to the terminal session
aside from switching sessions, I can't do anything else
in case it's related, I get a "User Switcher" error when I start X, although when I start normally (not in recovery mode) I can't even type anything in the login screen
haha - ok, is there a way I can check that?
sudo update-rc.d -f gdm remove && sudo update-rc.d gdm defaults 99 01
well you could restart gdm through ssh
i did that, but i still can't type anything or move the mouse
the cursor is blinking though, so I assume it's not frozen
is it a USB or ps2 mouse and what kind of mouse is it
